evidence: Here you can see a conceptual model where CT, PET, SPECT, and MRI components are arranged concentrically around a common patient table.
In this design, the PET ring and SPECT detectors are positioned together with an X-ray tube and detector pair for CT imaging
triples.o: a component in the integrated scanner

evidence: To move toward this vision of omni-tomography, we began by building a toy system - a small prototype that integrates all the scanners together in one setup.

In this design, the PET ring and SPECT detectors are positioned together with an X-ray tube and detector pair for CT imaging, while a specially designed open MRI magnet provides the magnetic field without blocking the other modalities.
